titleStmt.title: A light hearts a iewell. Or, The honest good blade who a free heart doth carry, and cares for nothing but to haue's owne vagary. To the tune of Iacke Puddings vagary.

publicationStmt.publisher: For I. Wright, dwelling in Gilt-spur Street.,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "All you that merry lives doe lead ..."
In two parts, separated for mounting; woodcuts at head of each part.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
